meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Berek Marcus Matthew Mahan Kerri McCoy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6654.

td.p: Berek Marcus, a video game quality assurance tester from Northborough, Massachusetts
Matthew Mahan, a child support officer from Hooksett, New Hampshire
Kerri McCoy, a pediatric emergency-room nurse from Jersey City, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,600)

tr.td: THAT'S SOME "TUDE"!
BUSINESS HISTORIES
CROSSING THE PARTY LINE
AROUND THE WORLD
BABY REGISTRY ITEMS
LONG MOVIE TITLES

tr.td: Kerri
Matthew
Berek

2 WORDS, 12 TOTAL LETTERS
A CROSS TO BEAR
BALLPARK TOWNS

TO PROTECT THE INNOCENT
